title: `all` Property
description: A property for defining the reset of all properties of an element

vendors_implementations.title: `:any-link` Hyperlink Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching anchor elements independent of whether they have been visited

vendors_implementations.title: `:blank` Empty-Value Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching form elements when they are empty

vendors_implementations.title: Break Properties
vendors_implementations.description: Properties for defining the break behavior between and within boxes

vendors_implementations.title: `e`, `pi`, `infinity`, `-infinity` and `NaN` constants for calculation
vendors_implementations.description: Constants for calculation simplification

vendors_implementations.title: CSS Cascade Layers
vendors_implementations.description: The `@layer` at-rule allows authors to explicitly layer their styles in the cascade, before specificity and order of appearance are considered.

vendors_implementations.title: Case-Insensitive Attributes
vendors_implementations.description: An attribute selector matching attribute values case-insensitively

vendors_implementations.title: `clamp` Function
vendors_implementations.description: The clamp() CSS function clamps a value between an upper and lower bound. It enables selecting a middle value within a range of values between a defined minimum and maximum.

vendors_implementations.title: `color-adjust` Property
vendors_implementations.description: The color-adjust property is a non-standard CSS extension that can be used to force printing of background colors and images

vendors_implementations.title: `color-contrast()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for choosing the color that contrasts the most.

vendors_implementations.title: `color()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function that allows a color to be specified in a particular, specified color space rather than the implicit sRGB color space that most of the other color functions operate in.

vendors_implementations.title: Color Functional Notation
vendors_implementations.description: A space and slash separated notation for specifying colors

vendors_implementations.title: `color-mix()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for mixing colors

vendors_implementations.title: `color-mod()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for modifying colors

vendors_implementations.title: Container Queries
vendors_implementations.description: New container property and container at rule to make changes depending on the container's size

vendors_implementations.title: Custom Media Queries
vendors_implementations.description: An at-rule for defining aliases that represent media queries

vendors_implementations.title: Custom Properties
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for defining custom values accepted by all CSS properties

vendors_implementations.title: Custom Property Sets
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for storing properties in named variables, referenceable in other style rules

vendors_implementations.title: Custom Selectors
vendors_implementations.description: An at-rule for defining aliases that represent selectors

browser_support.example:
@custom-selector :--heading h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6;

article :--heading + p {***REMOVED***

vendors_implementations.title: `:dir` Directionality Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching elements based on their directionality

vendors_implementations.title: Two values syntax for `display`
vendors_implementations.description: Syntax that allows definition of outer and inner displays types for an element

vendors_implementations.title: Double Position Gradients
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for using two positions in a gradient.

vendors_implementations.title: Custom Environment Variables
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for using custom values accepted by CSS globally

vendors_implementations.title: `pow()`, `sqrt()`, `hypot()`, `log()`, `exp()` exponential functions
vendors_implementations.description: Compute various exponential functions with their arguments

vendors_implementations.title: `fangsong` Font Family
vendors_implementations.description: A generic font used for Fang Song (仿宋) typefaces in Chinese

vendors_implementations.title: Logical Values in float and clear
vendors_implementations.description: Flow-relative (inline-start and inline-end) values for float and clear

vendors_implementations.title: `:focus-visible` Focus-Indicated Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching focused elements that indicate that focus to a user

vendors_implementations.title: `:focus-within` Focus Container Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching elements that are either focused or that have focused descendants

vendors_implementations.title: Font `format()` Keywords
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for specifying font format as a keyword in `@font-face` rule’s `format()` function

vendors_implementations.title: `font-variant` Property
vendors_implementations.description: A property for defining the usage of alternate glyphs in a font

vendors_implementations.title: Gamut mapping for CSS color functions
vendors_implementations.description: Gamut map css colors to fit display specific gamuts.

vendors_implementations.title: Gap Properties
vendors_implementations.description: Properties for defining gutters within a layout

vendors_implementations.title: Gradients Interpolation Method
vendors_implementations.description: Define the interpolation method for gradients

vendors_implementations.title: `gray()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for specifying fully desaturated colors

vendors_implementations.title: Grid Layout
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for using a grid concept to lay out content

vendors_implementations.title: `:has()` Relational Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching ancestor and sibling elements

vendors_implementations.title: Hexadecimal Alpha Notation
vendors_implementations.description: A 4 & 8 character hex color notation for specifying the opacity level

vendors_implementations.title: `hwb()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for specifying colors by hue and then a degree of whiteness and blackness to mix into it

vendors_implementations.title: `ic` length unit
vendors_implementations.description: Equal to the used advance measure of the "水" (CJK water ideograph, U+6C34) glyph found in the font used to render it

vendors_implementations.title: `image-set()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for specifying image sources based on the user’s resolution

vendors_implementations.title: `:in-range` and `:out-of-range` Pseudo-Classes
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching elements that have range limitations

vendors_implementations.title: `:is()` Matches-Any Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching elements in a selector list

vendors_implementations.title: `lab()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for specifying colors expressed in the CIE Lab color space

vendors_implementations.title: `lch()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: A function for specifying colors expressed in the CIE Lab color space with chroma and hue

vendors_implementations.title: `light-dark()` Function
vendors_implementations.description: React to the current used `color-scheme` value

vendors_implementations.title: Logical Overflow
vendors_implementations.description: Flow-relative `overflow` properties

vendors_implementations.title: Logical Overscroll Behavior
vendors_implementations.description: Flow-relative `overscroll-behavior` properties

vendors_implementations.title: Logical Properties and Values
vendors_implementations.description: Flow-relative (left-to-right or right-to-left) properties and values

vendors_implementations.title: Logical values in the `resize` property
vendors_implementations.description: Flow-relative (block or inline) values in resize

vendors_implementations.title: Logical Viewport Units
vendors_implementations.description: Flow-relative (horizontal or vertical) Viewport Units

vendors_implementations.title: `:matches()` Matches-Any Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching elements in a selector list

vendors_implementations.title: Aspect-Ratio number values
vendors_implementations.description: Support `<ratio>` values with `<number>` components in `@media`
vendors_implementations.title: Media Query Ranges
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for defining media query ranges using ordinary comparison operators
vendors_implementations.title: Nested `calc()`
vendors_implementations.description: Nest calc functions with the calc function name
vendors_implementations.title: Nesting Rules
vendors_implementations.description: A syntax for nesting relative rules within rules
vendors_implementations.title: `:not()` Negation List Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for ignoring elements in a selector list
vendors_implementations.title: `oklab` and `oklch` color functions
vendors_implementations.description: Functions that allow colors to be expressed in OKLab and OKLCH.
vendors_implementations.title: Support for percentages for `opacity`
vendors_implementations.description: Syntactic sugar to use percentages instead of a float between 0 and 1.
vendors_implementations.title: `overflow` Shorthand Property
vendors_implementations.description: A property for defining `overflow-x` and `overflow-y`
vendors_implementations.title: `overflow-wrap` Property
vendors_implementations.description: A property for defining whether to insert line breaks within words to prevent overflowing
vendors_implementations.title: `overscroll-behavior` Property
vendors_implementations.description: Properties for controlling when the scroll position of a scroll container reaches the edge of a scrollport
vendors_implementations.title: Place Properties
vendors_implementations.description: Properties for defining alignment within a layout
vendors_implementations.title: `prefers-color-scheme` Media Query
vendors_implementations.description: A media query to detect if the user has requested the system use a light or dark color theme
vendors_implementations.title: `prefers-reduced-motion` Media Query
vendors_implementations.description: A media query to detect if the user has requested less animation and general motion on the page
vendors_implementations.title: `:read-only` and `:read-write` selectors
vendors_implementations.description: Pseudo-classes to match elements which are considered user-alterable
vendors_implementations.title: `rebeccapurple` Color
vendors_implementations.description: A particularly lovely shade of purple in memory of Rebecca Alison Meyer
vendors_implementations.title: Relative Colors
vendors_implementations.description: Modify existing colors using color functions
vendors_implementations.title: `:scope()` Reference Element Pseudo-class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching one or more scoping roots
vendors_implementations.title: `abs()` and `sign()` functions
vendors_implementations.description: The sign-related functions—abs() and sign()—compute various functions related to the sign of their argument
vendors_implementations.title: `src()` function
vendors_implementations.description: The argument of `src()` can be provided by functions, such as var(). Otherwise this behaves the same as `url()`
vendors_implementations.title: `round()`, `mod()` and `rem()` functions
vendors_implementations.description: The stepped-value functions, `round()`, `mod()`, and `rem()`, all transform a given value according to another "step value", in different ways
vendors_implementations.title: `system-ui` Font Family
vendors_implementations.description: A generic font used to match the user’s interface
vendors_implementations.title: `text-decoration` shorthand
vendors_implementations.description: A property for defining `text-decoration-line`, `text-decoration-thickness`, `text-decoration-style` and `text-decoration-color`
vendors_implementations.title: `sin()`, `cos()`, `tan()`, `asin()`, `acos()`, `atan()` and `atan2()` functions
vendors_implementations.description: Functions to calculate various basic trigonometric relationships
vendors_implementations.title: `unset` Keyword
vendors_implementations.description: The unset CSS keyword resets a property to its inherited value if the property naturally inherits from its parent, and to its initial value if not.
vendors_implementations.title: When/Else Rules
vendors_implementations.description: At-rules for specifying media queries and support queries in a single grammar
vendors_implementations.title: `:where()` Zero-Specificity Pseudo-Class
vendors_implementations.description: A pseudo-class for matching elements in a selector list without contributing specificity
